page.title: 09CLUBS IN BISHOPS LYDEARD
page.content: There are a large number of organisations all of which are longstanding and well supported. Amateur Dramatic Society-produces two plays a year and has performed annually since 1934. Antiques Circle-meets monthly with a different topic discussed or explained by a speaker. Badminton Club-meets weekly and has 2 teams in district leagues. The Royal British Legion-organisies the Remembrance Sunday Service. The Royal British Legion(Women's Branch)-have the reputation of being able to provide tea and cakes for any function regardless of situation. Cricket Club-has own ground just outside village,play friendly and league matches. Continued on Page 10.
